page.title: 05Oakley School
page.content: Our school has four classes which are Infant,Transition,Junior 1,Junior 2.The school name is Oakley Parochial Combined School which means it is a Parish school for children aged 5-11.There are two playgrounds,one for boys and one for girls.We have a big playing field on which we play rounders,football and tennis. On Monday 1 July we are having our School Sports for which the green,red and blue teams race against each other to win a cup.We have an outdoor heated swimming pool and on Tuesday some of the Ickford children come to use it. In April,some of the 2nd,3rd and 4th years went to Wales for a week on school journey. There are two gym clubs in school,both on Thursday.One is for infants at lunch-time, the other is for Juniors after school.
